about_the_game:
This is a casual Sokoban game. Players need to use the keyboard to control the male character to move to the female character to complete the task and move to the next level. However, there are many pitfalls in this process. At this point, the boy needs to push the box on the map to fill the trap and continue passing.
Watch out for monsters. When you enter their territory, monsters will chase you.
You need to use boxes and terrain to avoid or trap monsters.
When you find and collect all the characters, you can unlock this DLC nude. When you unlock the level and find the girl, you unlock the DLC. This DLC contains 14 naked girls.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some pornography, 
all characters are over 18 years old
The game includes some character nudity or sexual behavior.
